page.title: 02POLING CORNER
page.content: The area we first decided to do the survey on is called Poling Corner. Poling corner is situated amongst arable land. There are no shops but next to the A27 there was a post office. Most of the houses have country names and are associated with the farming around it e.g. Sheperds cottage Around the houses and next to the A27 there are some rape fields these are a bright yellow in colour. From the A27 there is one small narrow lane, along the side of the road there are fences which are covered with wild flowers. Most of the houses are modern and some are still being built.The houses that are completed are in 1980 style. There is only one church called St Nicholas where renovation is taking place.
